title: Does the Supreme Court Have Too Much Power?
itunes:title: Does the Supreme Court Have Too Much Power?
description:
Constitutional law expert Stephen Vladeck, a Professor at the University of Texas Law School, discusses the Supreme Court term in which the justices wiped away the constitutional right to abortion, expanded gun rights and upended the law of church and state.
Elections law expert Richard Briffault, a Professor at Columbia Law School, discusses the Supreme Court agreeing to use a North Carolina redistricting case to consider adopting a far-reaching legal doctrine that would affect elections.
June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
